segments.text: The scene depicts a typical kitchen with people going about their day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces the sink, drying her plate with care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet water fills the basin and spills over continuously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a slippery mess on the tile floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is submerged, yet she remains focused elsewhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinets reveal the cookie jar, full and inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy balances on the stool, hand inside the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks unsteady, legs apart and tilting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaches up, eager for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're pulling off a clever little theft.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window highlights the garden path outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes line the way, everything neat and orderly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, though, it's a recipe for trouble with water and heights.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I almost want to yell at the page to warn them.
segments.speaker: PAR
